nome: Super Danganronpa 2.5: Komaeda Nagito to Sekai no Hakaimono

metadata_completo.titulo_oficial: Super Danganronpa 2.5: Komaeda Nagito to Sekai no Hakaisha
metadata_completo.titulo_ingles: Super Danganronpa 2.5: Nagito Komaeda and the Destroyer of the World
metadata_completo.sinopse:
At Hope's Peak Academy, a school full of extraordinarily talented individuals, Nagito Komaeda is an ordinary boy with no special traits or interesting skills to speak ofâ€”except for his incredible unluckiness. Just walking to school in the morning leads to a number of unfortunate accidents, which only escalate as the day goes on. Despite this, Komaeda leads a relatively normal life and is satisfied with his modest slice of happiness.

But everything changes when a mysterious boy who declares himself the "Destroyer of the World" arrives to shatter this hopeless paradise.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
